_header: Jesu Christ of Nazareth / That for us all sufferedest
Subjects: Christ, wounds of; prayers, by Christ and His Passion
_description: A prayer of the Five Wounds — one 6-line stanza (aabccb)

CULIi643.First Lines:
ihesu crist of NaȝareþThat for vs all suffriddist
                    deþ…
CULIi643.Last Lines:
…That ȝe suffryd in ȝoure lyuehaue mercy on me
                    Amen
